titleInfo.title: Thesaurus of economic, social, and cultural rights : terminology and potential violations

name.namePart: American Association for the Advancement of Science

originInfo.publisher: American Association for the Advancement of Science

mods.note: "HURIDOCS, Human Rights Information and Documentation Systems, International"--P. [4] of cover./ "This handbook was produced ... with the goal of developing tools, methods and resources to help non-governmental organisations (NGOs) to identify, monitor, and document violations of ... human rights"--Foreword.

titleInfo.title: Published under grant # 09950625 to AAAS (one of two)
